channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical Ltd. -- Apport
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical Ltd. -- Apport

item.title: CVE-2023-1326|2024-08-02T05:40:59.987Z -- canonical%20ltd. -- apport
item.description: A privilege escalation attack was found in apport-cli 2.26.0 and earlier which is similar to CVE-2023-26604. If a system is specially configured to allow unprivileged users to run sudo apport-cli, less is configured as the pager, and the terminal size can be set: a local attacker can escalate privilege. It is extremely unlikely that a system administrator would configure sudo to allow unprivileged users to perform this class of exploit.

item.title: CVE-2022-28657|2024-06-20T16:14:22.228Z -- canonical%20ltd. -- apport
item.description: Apport does not disable python crash handler before entering chroot
